properties.address: The Light Church, Bradford, West Yorkshire BD1 4EJ

properties.description: Arabica Café is at the heart of our charity, providing a welcoming space where people can enjoy complimentary tea, coffee, sandwiches, or hot meals in a comfortable setting. Our services not only address food insecurity by offering free meals to the most disadvantaged members of society, but we also aim to support individuals facing mental and emotional challenges. This is especially vital during these challenging times, with rising living costs and limited support for the homeless community as many food banks struggle to keep up with demand.
properties.title: Feedo Needo

properties.title: Gateway Community Cafe

properties.address: All Hallows Church, West Yorkshire LS6 1NP
properties.description: Rainbow Junktion is a pay-as-you-can community cafe that offers a warm welcome to everyone. We intercept food that would otherwise be thrown away from supermarkets, restaurants and a number of other sources, and turn it into healthy, nutritious meals for anyone and everyone on a pay-as-you-feel/can donation basis. We also now run a foodshare (a pay-as-you-feel/can food bank) using some surplus food and some bought food as so many in our community are struggling. All our services are always non-referral, non judgemental and open to absolutely everyone!
properties.title: Rainbow Junktion

properties.address: St. Christophers Church, Bradford, West Yorkshire BD4 9EJ
properties.description: Our warm space runs alongside our food pantry. Both are hosted in our church space where you can sit with a cuppa and a biscuit while you enjoy a chat or play one of our board games. We also have free soup available after 10:45. You could also join our new Knit & Natter craft group. Bring along a project or come and try something new with the materials we have available for free. We have recently joined the FoodSavers network of Food Pantries. Membership costs £6 per visit for between 15 and 20 items including fresh, tinned and frozen food. There is also the option of getting the shopping cheaper and saving £1 with the Bradford Credit Union.
properties.title: St Christopher's Warm Space & FoodSavers Pantry

properties.address: St. Urban's Catholic Church, West Yorkshire LS6 2AQ
properties.description: St Urban’s Warm Welcome Bereavement Space is open to anyone who has been bereaved, however long ago, and who would like somewhere warm and welcoming in these dark winter months to talk and to listen. We are open the first Wednesday evening in the month from 7pm to 8.30pm This is not counselling. We offer a warm welcoming space to chat and meet. We provide free hot drinks, safe accessible space; toilets, ramp etc. Every person's grief is unique. Nevertheless it can be helpful to meet with others with similar stories so at St Urban's Warm and Welcome Bereavement Space we can also provide information about organisations that can help with different kinds of grief.
properties.title: St Urban’s Meeting Room

properties.address: 4 Berking Avenue, Leeds, West Yorkshire LS9 9LF
properties.description: St Vincent's Community Support Centre Located in the heart of Richmond Hill and Burmantofts, St Vincent's is a warm and welcoming space open to all. Our community café and shop provide a cozy environment, and we offer a range of free services, including debt advice, immigration support, language education, food and furniture assistance, and wellbeing activities. Come and connect with others while accessing essential support.
